Information Requested: Average daily attendance

for all schools with a % teachers of color less than 5, they will receive a 1 on our Likert scale. We decided to set 5% as a "floor" because even in a school that is 100% white, there should still be teachers of color. If a school has greater than or equal to 5%, then the formula is: (% teachers of color/% students of color) * (4/0.25)
